Title: Shatranj - Yet another Chess program
Description: A WPF / Silverlight based frontend to Huo Chess.   This project was conceived as a way to learn key WPF / Silverlight concepts.  At the release, it's envisaged to support .Net 4.0 & Silverlight 4.0.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A WPF / Silverlight based frontend to Huo Chess. This project was conceived as a way to learn key WPF / Silverlight concepts. At the release, it's envisaged to support .Net 4.0 & Silverlight 4.0.

This project is currently under development published as a companian to notes at my blog http://www.thinkfarahead.com. Currently, the project includes VS2008 solution files. When 4.0 features make into the source, solution files will be upgarded to the current version of VS2010.
